SELECT parts.parts_id,parts.parts_brand_id, parts.parts_name,parts.parts_code, parts.parts_model, parts.parts_unit, parts.parts_spec, parts.parts_factory, parts.origin, parts.shelf_life, parts.price, parts.discount, parts.cur_price,parts.is_usable, brand.parts_brand_name,pt.parts_type_id,pt.type_name,pt.parts_type, ( SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(model_name separator '；') AS model_name FROM hqls_car_model WHERE model_id IN ( SELECT model_id FROM hqls_parts_model WHERE parts_id = #{partsId} ) ) AS fitModels
FROM hqls_parts parts LEFT JOIN hqls_parts_brand brand ON parts.parts_brand_id = brand.parts_brand_id LEFT JOIN hqls_parts_type pt ON parts.parts_type_id = pt.parts_type_id WHERE parts.parts_id = #{partsId}

select parts.parts_id, parts.parts_name, parts.parts_model, parts.parts_unit, parts.parts_spec, parts.cur_price, brand.parts_brand_name from hqls_parts as parts left join hqls_parts_brand as brand on parts.parts_brand_id = brand.parts_brand_id where parts.parts_type_id = #{partTypeId} and parts.is_usable = 1
and (parts.parts_name like CONCAT('%', #{condition} ,'%') or parts.parts_spec like CONCAT('%', #{condition} ,'%') or parts.parts_model like CONCAT('%', #{condition} ,'%'))

select parts.parts_id, parts.parts_name, parts.parts_model, parts.parts_unit, parts.parts_spec, parts.cur_price, parts.is_usable, parts.price from hqls_parts as parts where parts.parts_id = #{partsId}

select detail.buy_count, detail.buy_price, parts.parts_id, parts.parts_name, parts.parts_model, parts.parts_unit, parts.parts_spec, parts.cur_price, parts.is_usable, parts.price,hqb.parts_brand_name from hqls_order_detail as detail left join hqls_parts as parts on detail.parts_id = parts.parts_id left join hqls_parts_brand hqb on hqb.parts_brand_id = parts.parts_brand_id where detail.purchase_order_id = #{orderId}

UPDATE hqls_parts SET
parts_name = #{partsName}, parts_model = #{partsModel}, parts_unit = #{partsUnit}, parts_spec = #{partsSpec}, parts_brand_id = #{partsBrandId}, parts_factory = #{partsFactory}, origin = #{origin}, shelf_life = #{shelfLife}, price = #{price}, discount = #{discount}, cur_price = #{curPrice}, remark = #{remark}, is_usable = #{isUsable}, parts_type_id = #{partsTypeId}, dml_time = now() WHERE parts_id = #{partsId}
mapper.select: select pa.parts_id,pa.parts_name,pa.parts_code, pa.parts_model,pa.parts_unit,pa.parts_spec, pa.parts_factory,pa.origin,pa.shelf_life, pa.price,pa.discount,pa.cur_price,pa.is_usable, hpt.type_name as p_name,hpt.pid,hpt.parts_type as parts_top_type_id, case when hpt.parts_type=1 then '易损件' when hpt.parts_type=2 then '车型件' else '标志数字不存在' end as parts_top_type from hqls_parts pa inner join hqls_parts_type hpt on hpt.parts_type_id=pa.parts_type_id where 1=1 and pa.parts_code like CONCAT('%',#{partsCode},'%') and pa.parts_name like CONCAT('%',#{partsName},'%') and hpt.parts_type=#{partsTopTypeId} and (hpt.pid=#{partsTypeId} or hpt.parts_type_id=#{partsTypeId}) and pa.parts_id=#{partsId} order by pa.create_time desc

SELECT part.parts_id AS `partsId`, part.parts_name AS `partsName`, part.parts_type_id as `partsTypeId`, part.cur_price as partsPrice, (SELECT pic.url FROM hqls_parts_pic AS pic WHERE pic.parts_id = part.parts_id ORDER BY sorting LIMIT 0,1) as `picUrl` FROM hqls_parts AS part WHERE 1=1
and part.parts_id IN (SELECT hpm.parts_id FROM hqls_parts_model AS hpm WHERE hpm.model_id = #{modelId})

SELECT type.parts_type_id AS `key`, type.type_name AS `value` FROM hqls_parts_model AS hpm LEFT JOIN hqls_parts AS part ON hpm.parts_id = part.parts_id LEFT JOIN hqls_parts_type type ON part.parts_type_id = type.parts_type_id WHERE hpm.model_id = #{modelId}
select model_id as `key` , model_name as `value` from hqls_car_model where 1=1 and series_id=#{seriesId} and model_name like CONCAT('%',#{modelName},'%')
select series_id as `key` , series_name as `value` from hqls_car_series where 1=1 and brand_id=#{brandId} and series_name like CONCAT('%',#{seriesName},'%')
select brand_id as `key` , brand_name as `value` from hqls_car_brand where 1=1 and brand_name like CONCAT('%',#{brandName},'%')

SELECT hp.`parts_id`, cb.`brand_id` as carBrandId, cb.`brand_name` as carBrandName , cs.`series_id` as carSeriesId, cs.`series_name` as carSeriesName FROM `hqls_car_brand` cb INNER JOIN hqls_car_series cs ON cb.`brand_id`=cs.`brand_id` INNER JOIN hqls_car_model cm ON cs.`series_id`=cm.`series_id` INNER JOIN hqls_parts_model pm ON pm.`model_id`=cm.`model_id` INNER JOIN hqls_parts hp ON hp.`parts_id`=pm.`parts_id` WHERE 1=1 and hp.`parts_id`=#{partsId} GROUP BY cb.`brand_id`
